results.author: Thomas Edison
results.content: Results! Why, man, I have gotten a lot of results. I know several thousand things that won't work.

results.author: Thomas Edison
results.content: Hell, there are no rules here-- we're trying to accomplish something.

results.author: Thomas Edison
results.content: There is no expedient to which a man will not go to avoid the labor of thinking.

results.author: Thomas Edison
results.content: Faith, as well intentioned as it may be, must be built on facts, not fiction--faith in fiction is a damnable false hope.

results.author: Charles Dickens
results.content: We need never be ashamed of our tears.
